    • Method Detail

      • encrypt

        public static String encrypt(char[] password,
             byte[] salt,
             String data)
        Encrypts data by key.
        Parameters:
        password - the secret key.
        salt - the salt, can be null. But it is highly recommended that you should provide it.
        data - the data.
        Returns:
        the encrypted data.
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - which wraps the original exception related to cipher process.

      • decrypt

        public static String decrypt(char[] password,
             byte[] salt,
             String data)
        Decrypts an encrypted string (data) by key.
        Parameters:
        password - the password.
        salt - the salt, can be null. But it is highly recommended that you should provide it.
        data - the data.
        Returns:
        the decrypted string, or null if password is invalid.
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - which wraps the original exception related to cipher process.

      • sha256

        public static byte[] sha256(String s)
        Calculates SHA-256 of a string.
        Parameters:
        s - the string.
        Returns:
        the SHA-256 of given string.
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - which wraps UnsupportedEncodingException in case the system does not support UTF8.

      • sha256

        public static byte[] sha256(byte[] bytes)
        Calculates SHA-256 of a byte array.
        Parameters:
        bytes - the byte array.
        Returns:
        the SHA-256 of given data.
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - which wraps NoSuchAlgorithmException in case the system does not support calculating message digest of SHA256.
